thread.title: Catherine Paige
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Catherine Paige

author: Catherine Paige
title: Catherine Paige
text: I ordered Vella Vella Alexis, Beshe Drew 2, Half-wig Antonia I love them all. However I have to say I love how beautiful, and chic Alexis is I love this wig so much that I am going to order 2 more. Another thing I have to rave about is how quickly my shipment was delivered to my home. I ordered my wigs on late Saturday night, and my items were sent to my home on Wednesday. Thank you so much for your awesome service and wigs👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽
